node.prompt: Well done criminal! You took down those filthy pirates! Don't worry though, we'll erase your memory of this event soon enough so you don't go spreading any nonsense to the empire! Remember, F.R.I.E.N.D says, there's no such thing as a non empire ship in this galaxy!
Chances are those imaginary pirates might come back though... We'd better move a few lightyears just to be on the safe side!
Head back to the station and I'll explain how to work the jump drive. *sigh* Thank goodness you'll have this embarrassing little memory erased criminal!
